artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Gaetano Guadagnini; Painter: After Agostino Carracci
description: man at center kneeling before priest holding host; group of men surrounding; two cherubs on cloud above; skull on ground next to kneeling man; water bucket next to man holding flaming stick
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [ Agostino Carracci dip.;  F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Guadagnini inc. LA COMUNIONE DI S. GIROLAMO/ ACARA(in image at bottom)]; in pencil on plate: [1-227]
title: La Comunione di S. Girolamo
